p: The aqueous extract of T. leucocladum was exhaustively extracted by boiling 100 g of plant powder in 1 L distilled water for 2 h at 100°C. The produced extract was then filtered using Whatman filter paper No.1 and dried using a freeze dryer (Mill-Rock Technology, 85bt, Nanjing, China). The obtained dried aqueous extracts were weighed and stored at 4°C until being used.
